home.name: Hi , I'm Carlos Orozco
home.description: I am a professional with experience in Telecommunications, Servers and Programming
project.description1: Simulation in MATLAB of the Digital Modulations M_ASK, M_FSK, M_PSK, M_QAM, 64 bits of the TX of images of 5 formats: gif, png, jpg, among others. Obtain from the project data of the modulation and demodulation that are: Equation, index of AB modulation, Waveform obtain the Spectral Density of the Signal.
project.description2: Security system through chatbot, the telegram api is used to control real-time notifications of the person at the door, access control through arduino and esp32cam.
project.description3: HMI of the automation process of a liquid bottling plant using a S7-1500 plc and Labview to visualize the process in real time.
project.description4: Automation of a bottling crate plant using tia portal, node red and rasberry pi.
project.description5: Security system through chatbot, the whatsapp api is used to control real-time notifications of the person at the door, access control through arduino and esp32cam.
project.description6: Recognition of Characters in an image using OCR (Optical Character Recognition).
project.description7: Landing page using reacts js and sass.
